actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
House Committee on House Administration Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the transfer of original documents of the House of Representatives to the Lyndon Baines Johnson Library.

summary.text: Authorizes the transfer of the following original documents of the House of Representatives to the Lyndon Baines Johnson Library: (1) the appointment form of Lyndon B. Johnson as a clerk dated December 10, 1931; and (2) the salary card of Lyndon B. Johnson during his period as a House employee.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the transfer of original documents of the House of Representatives to the Lyndon Baines Johnson Library.
